wikipedia_page.main: Jon Levy (born 1967) is a British photojournalist. He was the founder and director of Foto8. Foto8 was a British-based photography company responsible for the publication of 8 Magazine, the Biannual of Photography, as well as its sister website Foto8.com and the Host gallery in London.

response: *Rise: Images of Life Change. Dubai: Legatum; London: Foto8, 2010. Edited by Jon Levy. . With text by Max Houghton and photographs by Dearden and others.
*Jon Levy (photographer), founder and director of British photography company Foto8
*Jon Levy (behaviorist), behavior expert and social engineer
